project.description:
Creates multiple packaged components and deploys the packages to a given environment If the package with the same version exists, a new package is not created. If the package is deployed, the deployment step is ignored. Optionally store the package components in GIT and run SonarQube static code analysis on the package. The latest version of the component is packaged. Use Create Package or Deploy Package to create/deploy different component version.
source bin/deployPackages.sh

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: componentIds
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma separate list of component IDs to be packaged and deployed if this value is null component names will be used instead

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: processNames
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma separate list of component names to be packaged and deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: packageVersion
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Version of the Package to be created

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: componentType
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Default component type of these components. If using mixed component types. Keep this blank.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: extractComponentXmlFolder
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: If this value is set the component XMLs with the package will be extracted. This may take up to 2 minutes to extract all components of the package

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: tag
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: If this value is set the component XML will be stored in GIT. In the ${gitRepoURL} configured.
